mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_machine_action (action_category, cut_distance, board_category, board_specification, board_material, order_id) VALUES (#{actionCategory}, #{cutDistance}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardSpecification}, #{boardMaterial}, #{orderId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM tb_machine_action
SELECT COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM tb_processed_action
SELECT id, state, action_category, cut_distance, board_category, board_specification, board_material, order_id, created_at FROM tb_machine_action ORDER BY id
SELECT TOP 1 state FROM tb_machine_action ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_machine_action SET state = N'已完成' WHERE state != N'已完成'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_processed_action SELECT id, state, action_category, cut_distance, board_category, board_specification, board_material, order_id, created_at FROM tb_machine_action
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS rotate_action_count FROM tb_machine_action WHERE action_category = N'旋转' AND state = N'未完成';
